channel.title: Back to Runescape Private Servers for me
channel.description: Well let me start by saying I haven't coded or hosted any server in A few years. At the time mostly everything was 317 (basically it was the allstar source days.) Well now im back having coded 3 sources A client and customs, but at the time it was all 317. Now I am wanting to get back into to server coding and hosting, to further my skills in Java. Where should I start now? What all has changed? I've also noticed silabsoft no longer exists for the interest of runescape private servers. I just need A little guidance.

item.title: Back to Runescape Private Servers for me
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

axlrose103:

im not loveing with PI or Allstar. I’ve spent A couple hours looking at source I think im going to start with Fallen-Wars

Isn’t that a PI…

Read full topic

item.title: Back to Runescape Private Servers for me

item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:6, topic:509727”][quote author=axlrose103 link=topic=627972.msg4267109#msg4267109 date=1364165925]
im not loveing with PI or Allstar. I’ve spent A couple hours looking at source I think im going to start with Fallen-Wars
[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

If that’s the source that you intend on using I would think again. I haven’t downloaded it or anything, but I doubt that it is stable and it is most likely riddled with bugs.[/quote]

item.title: Back to Runescape Private Servers for me
item.dc:creator: @axlrose103 axlrose103
item.description:
@axlrose103 wrote:

Thanks Clawz I think ill look into the good releases I’ve heard of Hyperion but never actually looked into it. I don’t want to start with some old shitty source like reapage, or allstar again. Too much work just fixing the bugs takes A few days. Also I noticed that you are working on frameworks. Good lord you’ve got some experience haha.

Read full topic
item.source: Back to Runescape Private Servers for me

item.title: Back to Runescape Private Servers for me
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

PI is the new allstar. People prefer 600+ shit added on a 317, rather than programming the actual revision itself. No one uses the good releases (Hyperion, RuneSource, Apollo, etc.) that were actually made by people who know what they’re doing.

welcome back

Read full topic
